vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting an amendment to Specific Use Permit No. 1959 for an attached projecting non-premise district activity videoboard sign on property zoned Planned Development District No. 619, on the southeast corner of Elm Street and North Field Street
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval for a six-year period, subject to amended conditions
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval for a six-year period, subject to amended conditions
Z234-209(WK)
